# MLTensor.PaddingMode.symmetric

**Case**

Pads the input tensor using the reflection of the input, including the edge value.

## Declaration

```swift
case symmetric
```

## Padding modes

- **MLTensor.PaddingMode.constant(_:)**: Pads the input tensor boundaries with a constant value.
- **MLTensor.PaddingMode.reflection**: Pads the input tensor using the reflection of the input boundary.

items.description: Pads the input tensor boundaries with a constant value.
